About Me

A bit about Jordon Carter…
I’m a Maryland native with a passion for computers and technology. Despite my busy lifestyle with work and school, I was always drawn to the idea that we can create the future through technology and dreamed of one day entering the field.
My interest in programming has led me through a journey that started with self-taught websites and bootcamp and now pursuing programming full-time. Since pursuing programming full-time, I have met many awesome and talented individuals with whom I have studied, learned from and built applications with. I am always looking for new opportunities while expanding my network so reach out to me!

Jordon A. Carter
